name: themes
description: Theme for portfolio site with light and dark modes

scripts.style: sass portfolio/scss/style.scss portfolio/css/style.css --no-source-map && sass portfolio/scss/style-dark.scss portfolio/css/style-dark.css --no-source-map
scripts.style-min: sass portfolio/scss/style.scss portfolio/css/style.min.css --no-source-map --style compressed && sass portfolio/scss/style-dark.scss portfolio/css/style-dark.min.css --no-source-map --style compressed

author: Dannipham
